name: Bountive
description: Bountive is a decentralized no-loss prize savings protocol on Starknet, empowering users with no-risk prize games. Bountive is based on the proven concept known as “Prize Linked Savings Accounts”. This product helps to boost savings. Now, we’re bringing this to the blockchain.
short_description: The first decentralized prize saving protocol on Starknet, empowering users with no-risk rewards
